Name: Winter Warfare: Survival
About the game: A recon mission goes bad, and you are the only one who survive an enemy attack, you are left alone to survive in a dangerous area where the enemy has bases located. Your mission is to communicate with the base and ask for a rescue, to accomplish this, you will need to survive for a period in a harsh ambient. Vitals! Managing your health, hunger and thirst will be a constant. Fighting! You will have to fight enemy soldiers Hunting! You will need to hunt animals Explore! You will explore an harsh ambient Loot! Search and loot enemy bases Craft! Crafting items and structures for your survival Build! You will need to build a base for your protection Defend! You will need to defend your position from enemies
